alert.note: Alert for Broome; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 9:44AM EDT until May 04 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in New York... Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Tioga and Broome Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River At Vestal. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Moore Park in Vestal floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EDT Monday the stage was 20.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.8 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
